article_title: Hezbollah and Israel appear to want to avoid major confrontation.
sentence: At  the  funeral  of  Saleh  al-Arouri,  the  deputy  Hamas  leader  assassinated  in  Beirut  two  days  ago,  crowds  carried  banners  with  his  picture  and  waved  the  group's  green  flag  through  the  streets  amid  the  sound  of  music,  prayers  and  heavy  gunfire.
